offset.description: An array of two numbers to offset the component horizontally and vertically in pixels
offset.description_zh: 一个包含两个数字的数组，用于水平和垂直偏移组件（以像素为单位）

expand.description: By default the component shrinks to content's size; By using this prop you make the component fully expand horizontally or vertically, based on 'position' prop
expand.description_zh: 默认情况下，组件会缩小到内容的大小;通过使用这个 prop，你可以根据 'position' 属性使组件在水平或垂直方向上完全展开

scroll-offset.description: Scroll offset (in pixels) from which point the component is shown on page; Measured from the top of the page (or from the bottom if in 'reverse' mode)
scroll-offset.description_zh: 在页面上显示组件的起始点的滚动偏移量（以像素为单位）;从页面顶部测量（如果处于“反向”模式，则从底部测量）

reverse.description: Work in reverse (shows when scrolling to the top of the page and scrolls to bottom when triggered)
reverse.description_zh: 反向工作（滚动到页面顶部时显示，触发时滚动到底部）

duration.description: Duration (in milliseconds) of the scrolling until it reaches its target
duration.description_zh: 滚动到达目标之前的持续时间（以毫秒为单位）
